bibles.title: Rote Lole Bible
bibles.description: Genesis and the New Testament in the Rote Lole language of Indonesia

language.name: Lole
language.location: Indonesia, Nusa Tenggara and Southwestern Maluku
language.area: Rote Island west central, Lole and Ba’a domains. North Lole covers north and central regions of Lole domain.

bibles.title: Kupang Malay Bible
bibles.title_vernacular: Perjanjian Baru dalam bahasa Kupang Melayu
bibles.description: The New Testament in Kupang Malay of West Timor, Indonesia
bibles.description_vernacular: Perjanjian Baru dalam bahasa Kupang Melayu.  Te Tuhan Allah talalu sayang sang samua orang di ini dunya. Andia ko Dia utus sang Beta, Dia pung Ana satu biji ni, ko biar samua orang yang parcaya sang Beta sonde tapisa buang dari Tuhan. Deng bagitu, dong dapa idop yang batúl yang sonde tau putus-putus.

language.name: Kupang Malay
language.location: Indonesia, Nusa Tenggara and Southwestern Maluku

bibles.title: Rote Rikou Bible
bibles.description: Genesis and the New Testament in the Rote Rikou language of Indonesia
bibles.description_vernacular: Kejadian dan Perjanjian Baru dalam bahasa Rote Rikou

language.name: Ringgou
language.location: Indonesia, Nusa Tenggara and Southwestern Maluku
language.area: Rote Island east tip, Ringgou, Landu and Oepao areas.

bibles.title: Rote Dela Bible
bibles.description: Genesis and the New Testament in the Rote Dela language of Indonesia
bibles.description_vernacular: Kejadian dan Perjanjian Baru dalam bahasa Rote Dela

language.name: Dela-Oenale
language.location: Indonesia, Nusa Tenggara and Southwestern Maluku
language.area: Rote Island west coast, Dela and Oe Nale domains.

bibles.title: Tetun Dili Bible
bibles.description: Genesis and the New Testament in the Tetun Dili language of Indonesia
bibles.description_vernacular: Genesis eo Novo Testamento em língua tétum Dili

language.name: Tetun Dili
language.area: North coast of East Timor, L1 in Dili area; L2 scattered in west part of East Timor.

bibles.title: Rote Tii Bible
bibles.description: Genesis and the New Testament in the Rote Tii language of Indonesia
bibles.description_vernacular: Kejadian dan Perjanjian Baru dalam bahasa Rote Tii

language.name: Tii
language.location: Indonesia, Nusa Tenggara and Southwestern Maluku
language.area: Rote Island southwest, Tii domain, east of Dela-Oenale, west of Lole, south of Dengka.
